Comment: 54th GK Tournament, Round 1. I have won 4 lost 1, this is the final unfinished game. Homyak leads our section with 5 wins 1 loss. I can move on to round two, but only if I win this game to tie Homyak. I am playing black and choose the Sicilian.

Anticipating that white could return his bishop to g5 discovering a powerful attack on e5. The only good move to defend in that case is Nd7, but that would lose the pawn at e7. Thus, I play 17. Rfe8 to cover that eventuality.
